document.discussion_title: NewsInn | As Games End, Rio Celebrates While Looking Warily to Future
document.topic_text: Keywords: The skies opened on Sunday night over Maracanã, the stadium where Brazil bade farewell to the Rio Olympics with a spectacle celebrating everything from the giants of Brazilian music to the rock art drawn by tribesmen thousands of years ago, as if the heavens were lamenting the end of the 17-day sports extravaganza.
document.post: Keywords: The skies opened on Sunday night over Maracanã, the stadium where Brazil bade farewell to the Rio Olympics with a spectacle celebrating everything from the giants of Brazilian music to the rock art drawn by tribesmen thousands of years ago, as if the heavens were lamenting the end of the 17-day sports extravaganza.
